Subject : Letter of Intent to Hire


Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},


This Letter is in reference to your candidature submitted in our company. We take pleasure in offering you the position of a {{doc.designation}} in our organization. We would require you to submit your resignation letter for offer process. Once we receive your resignation letter we will release the Offer Letter with your Date of Joining.


Please acknowledge this email by reverting to indicate that you have accepted this offer. Look forward to have a mutual and beneficial association.

-----------------------------------------

Regards

Team HR

Prompt Equipments Pvt. Ltd.
